law.catch_line: Cancellation of invitations for bids or requests for proposals.
law.text: An invitation for bids, a request for proposals, or other solicitation may be canceled, or all bids or proposals may be rejected, if it is determined in writing that such action is taken in the best interest of the Commonwealth and approved by the purchasing officer.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 110, sec. 22, effective January 1, 1979.
